html: (2 Nephi 15:24)."As the fire devoureth the stubble." The Lord Jesus Christ declared that at His coming, "all the proud and they that do wickedly shall be as stubble; and I will burn them up, for I am the Lord of Hosts; and I will not spare any that remain in Babylon." (D&C 64:24; see also BICQ, 194-98.)
